Summary: Obsrved UFO from my back deck.Circular,with bright yellow lights.Hovering.Opened door to better observe object.It then immediately began to move,gliding still silently across the sky,and out of my view.
divs: Sighting DetailsWednesday,September 25,2013,at 7:30 P.M.,I noticed a bright object,circular,with what appeared to be spokes in the middle,covered with very bright yellow lights,both on the rim,and on the spokes.(Under the spokes,the craft appeared to be solid). The object was very visible,and very bright in the dark night sky.It was hovering when I first observed it. I then opened my screen door,and leaned out for a better look. At this point,it suddenly began to move,and still silent,moved in a straight line high above a row of trees,after which I could no longer see it.(as it flew silently away,it tipped a little to one side). It was a littlefrighteing because,it hovered until I opened the door,and leaned out,then began to move.I had the feeling I was being watched. I first noticed the object while in my living room.I caught a glimpse of it out my back door,and realized this wasn't a normal celestial body.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lisle
There were no other sightings in Lisle on or around September 23rd 2013
